title: 4 Pack Drawer Knobs, 35mm ABS Glass Cabinet Knobs Wolf Dresser Drawer Handle Pull Cupboard Door Knobs with Screws for Kitchen Bathroom Cabinet Hardware

Excellent surface finish provides good texture, feel and rich appearance that will give your furniture and rooms a good shiny appearance. You're gonna love these cabinet handles.

Ideal for cabinet, dresser, drawers, cupboards, wardrobes, bookcase in your home, kitchen, bathroom, living-room, book-room, dorm and office.
